description: Discover the best hotels in Amsterdam, Netherlands. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Heritage Amsterdam Riverfront Luxury with Indoor Pool & Sauna
hotels.description: It's easy to believe you've stepped back in time when you stay at the InterContinental Amstel Amsterdam, an IHG Hotel, located along the city's famous canals. Discover original heritage features, from 19th-century staircases to crystal chandeliers and polished marble floors. Be treated to gourmet delights with afternoon tea at the glass-enclosed Amstel Lounge, sip classic cocktails with a twist at the bar, and make use of the large indoor pool and steamy sauna at the Health Club.

hotels.title: Five-Star Japanese Luxury in Amsterdam's De Pijp Neighbourhood with Michelin-Star Restaurants
hotels.description: Exquisite five-star Japanese hospitality has made its way to Amserdam's stunning De Pijp neighbourhood at Hotel Okura Amsterdam. As a member of The Leading Hotels of the World, you can expect nothing but the finest, with five outstanding restaurants with three Michelin stars between them. When you aren't gazing out onto the shimmering Amsterdam skyline, retreat to the world-class Nagomi Spa, swimming pool or fitness centre for ultimate relaxation.

hotels.title: Creative Central Amsterdam Boutique Stay in Restored 17th & 18th Century Houses
hotels.description: For lovers of the finer things in life, experience Dutch luxury and a sprinkling of creativity with a five-star stay at Pulitzer Amsterdam. Spanning 25 restored 17th- and 18th-century homes, this site claims an enviable spot along Amsterdam's canals with the city’s love of the arts splashed throughout its interiors. Sample expertly crafted dishes in Pulitzer’s Garden or Jansz. and refresh the palate with a delicious cocktail at the cosy Pulitzer’s Bar.

hotels.title: Contemporary City Stay Near Johan Cruijff Arena
hotels.description: There are few things more Dutch than great design; experience it with a stay at Holiday Inn Amsterdam - Arena Towers, an IHG Hotel. Amsterdam is swelling with culture, with great artists such as Van Gogh and Rembrandt once calling this canal-woven city home. Visit the Rijksmuseum and bask in history’s masterpieces and spend a day roaring in the stands of the Johan Cruijff Arena. Live like a local and bike around to admire the age-old facades, or take in the sights on foot.

hotels.title: Amsterdam Urban Retreat with Iconic Canal Views
hotels.description: Fall in love with eye-catching Dutch Baroque architecture, lose yourself in the lively atmosphere and cycle along iconic canals with a stay at Crowne Plaza Amsterdam - South, an IHG Hotel. Dine on sumptuous cuisine with waterfront views at the hotel's signature restaurant Happyhappyjoyjoy Zudias, refresh at the onsite fitness centre or toast to your stay at Manhattan Lounge bar. When it's time to explore, heritage attractions, vibrant cafes, bars and restaurants are all within close reach.

hotels.title: Boutique-Style Amsterdam Luxury with Ultra-Cool Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Stay among the charming canals and whizzing bicycles of Amsterdam at Kimpton De Witt Hotel, a sophisticated hotel in the heart of the city. While you're here, dine at Celia, a modern American restaurant with a touch of Californian flavours found in its menu. For a tipple or two amid ultra-cool surroundings, Super Lyan is a casual cocktail bar with the works: a central circular bar, neon purple lighting and red leather booths - not to mention expertly shaken cocktails by resident mixologists.
